nsp.impl.output

Class ExperimentWriter_Text

  • java.lang.Object
    • nsp.impl.output.ExperimentWriter_Text
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExperimentWriter

    public class ExperimentWriter_Text
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExperimentWriter
    Used to write Experiment-level output to output files, including number of infested cells, Kappa statistics and end-of-run Raster output.
